text: <s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: Hello world [/INST] qo' vIvan </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: Good morning [/INST] Maj Po </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: What is your name? [/INST] nuq 'oH ponglIj'e' </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: How old are you? [/INST] ben 'ar bIbogh </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: What day of week is today? [/INST] DaHjaj pujwI'pu' </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: What time is it? [/INST] 'arlogh Qoylu'pu' </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: Can you speak English? [/INST] DIvI' Hol DajatlhlaH'a' </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: Where is the bathroom? [/INST] nuqDaq 'oH puchpa''e' </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: Why is the sky blue? [/INST] qatlh chegh </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: I want to learn Klingon [/INST] tlhIngan Hol vIghoj vIneH </s>
<s>[INST] Translate English to Klingon: Nice to meet you [/INST] qaghom 'e' vItIv </s>
